properties.entry: DELETE FROM "Heart" WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND PLC_CODE = ?

SELECT c.CATEGORY_NAME, p.PLC_NAME, h.HEART_DATE, PLC_CODE, i.FILE_PATH, i.ORIGIN_NAME FROM "Heart" h JOIN "Place" p USING (PLC_CODE) JOIN "Category" c USING(CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN "Image" i USING(PLC_CODE) WHERE MEM_NO = ?
DELETE FROM "Heart" WHERE PLC_CODE IN (SELECT PLC_CODE FROM "Place" WHERE PLC_NAME IN( @))
